verses.text: \w My|strong="G3450"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \add the Lord\add* of \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, \w with|strong="G1722"\w* respect of \w persons|strong="G4382"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* there \w come|strong="G1525"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w assembly|strong="G4864"\w* a \w man|strong="G0435"\w* with a gold \w ring|strong="G5554"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w goodly|strong="G2986"\w* \w apparel|strong="G2066"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* there come \w in|strong="G1525"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* a poor \w man|strong="G4434"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w vile|strong="G4508"\w* \w raiment|strong="G2066"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* ye have \w respect|strong="G1914"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* him \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w weareth|strong="G5409"\w* the \w gay|strong="G2986"\w* \w clothing|strong="G2066"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w say|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Sit|strong="G2521"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w here|strong="G5602"\w* in a good \w place|strong="G2573"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w say|strong="G2036"\w* to the \w poor|strong="G4434"\w*, \w Stand|strong="G2476"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w sit|strong="G2521"\w* \w here|strong="G5602"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w footstool|strong="G5286"\w*:

Are \w ye|strong="G1252"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w then|strong="G2532"\w* \w partial|strong="G1252"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* are \w become|strong="G1096"\w* \w judges|strong="G2923"\w* of \w evil|strong="G4190"\w* \w thoughts|strong="G1261"\w*?

\w Hearken|strong="G0191"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w Hath|strong="G1586"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w chosen|strong="G1586"\w* the \w poor|strong="G4434"\w* of \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w rich|strong="G4145"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w heirs|strong="G2818"\w* of the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he hath \w promised|strong="G1861"\w* to them \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* have \w despised|strong="G0818"\w* the \w poor|strong="G4434"\w*. \w Do|strong="G2616"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* rich \w men|strong="G4145"\w* \w oppress|strong="G2616"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w draw|strong="G1670"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w before|strong="G1519"\w* the judgment \w seats|strong="G2922"\w*?

\w Do|strong="G0987"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w blaspheme|strong="G0987"\w* that \w worthy|strong="G2570"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w by|strong="G1909"\w* the \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* are \w called|strong="G1941"\w*?

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* ye \w fulfil|strong="G5055"\w* the \w royal|strong="G0937"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w*, Thou shalt \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w neighbour|strong="G4139"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w thyself|strong="G4572"\w*, ye \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* ye have respect to \w persons|strong="G4380"\w*, ye \w commit|strong="G2038"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*, and are \w convinced|strong="G1651"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w transgressors|strong="G3848"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w whosoever|strong="G3748"\w* shall \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* the \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, and \w yet|strong="G1161"\w* \w offend|strong="G4417"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \add point\add*, he \w is|strong="G1096"\w* guilty \w of|strong="G1777"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he that \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Do|strong="G3431"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* commit \w adultery|strong="G3431"\w*, \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w Do|strong="G5407"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w kill|strong="G5407"\w*. \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* thou \w commit|strong="G3431"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w adultery|strong="G3431"\w*, \w yet|strong="G1161"\w* if thou \w kill|strong="G5407"\w*, thou art \w become|strong="G1096"\w* a \w transgressor|strong="G3848"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w So|strong="G3779"\w* speak \w ye|strong="G2980"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* they that \w shall|strong="G3195"\w* be \w judged|strong="G2919"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* of \w liberty|strong="G1657"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G4160"\w* shall have \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w* without \w mercy|strong="G0448"\w*, that hath \w shewed|strong="G4160"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w mercy|strong="G1656"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w mercy|strong="G1656"\w* rejoiceth \w against|strong="G2620"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w*.

\w What|strong="G5101"\w* \add doth it\add* \w profit|strong="G3786"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w though|strong="G1437"\w* a \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* he \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*? \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w save|strong="G4982"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*?

\w If|strong="G1437"\w* a \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w sister|strong="G0079"\w* \w be|strong="G5225"\w* \w naked|strong="G1131"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w destitute|strong="G3007"\w* of \w daily|strong="G2184"\w* \w food|strong="G5160"\w*,

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w one|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w say|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Depart|strong="G5217"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, \w be|strong="G2328"\w* \add ye\add* \w warmed|strong="G2328"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w filled|strong="G5526"\w*; \w notwithstanding|strong="G1161"\w* ye \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* those things which are \w needful|strong="G2006"\w* to the \w body|strong="G4983"\w*; \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \add doth it\add* \w profit|strong="G3786"\w*?

\w Even|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* it \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*, \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w being|strong="G2596"\w* \w alone|strong="G1438"\w*.

\w Yea|strong="G0235"\w*, a \w man|strong="G5100"\w* may \w say|strong="G2046"\w*, \w Thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w hast|strong="G2192"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, and \w I|strong="G2504"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*: \w shew|strong="G1166"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w without|strong="G1537"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*, and \w I|strong="G2504"\w* will \w shew|strong="G1166"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*.

\w Thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w believest|strong="G4100"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* there \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; thou \w doest|strong="G4160"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w*: the \w devils|strong="G1140"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w tremble|strong="G5425"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* wilt \w thou|strong="G2309"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w*, \w O|strong="G5599"\w* \w vain|strong="G2756"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*?

Was \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*, when he had \w offered|strong="G0399"\w* \w Isaac|strong="G2464"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w altar|strong="G2379"\w*?

Seest \w thou|strong="G0991"\w* \w how|strong="G3754"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* wrought \w with|strong="G4903"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w was|strong="G5048"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* made \w perfect|strong="G5048"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* was \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w* which \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* it was \w imputed|strong="G3049"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he was \w called|strong="G2564"\w* the \w Friend|strong="G5384"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

Ye \w see|strong="G3708"\w* \w then|strong="G5106"\w* how \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* is \w justified|strong="G1344"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w only|strong="G3441"\w*.

\w Likewise|strong="G3668"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1344"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w Rahab|strong="G4460"\w* the \w harlot|strong="G4204"\w* \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*, when she had \w received|strong="G5264"\w* the \w messengers|strong="G0032"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* had \w sent|strong="G1544"\w* \add them\add* \w out|strong="G1544"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \w way|strong="G3598"\w*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w as|strong="G5618"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*.
